code: /* eslint-disable no-unused-vars */import React from"react";import{Container,Typography}from"@material-ui/core";import{makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import{TextDecrypt}from"../content/TextDecrypt";import{FirstName,LastName}from"../../utils/getName";import"./About.css";import profile from"../../assets/profile.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{main:{maxWidth:"100vw",marginTop:"3em",marginBottom:"auto"}};});export var About=function About(){var classes=useStyles();var greetings="Hello there!";var aboutme="I'm ".concat(FirstName," ").concat(LastName,",16 years old self-thought person in all necessary aspects. Since 2022 I have been learning web development. at first, I started with the Udemy course in 2022, but then I challenged myself and tried to learn programming basics without any mentor. During this time I learnt HTML, CSS; Bootstrap; Git; GitHub; JavaScript; npm; ReactJs as programming knowledge.");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"about",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{component:"main",className:classes.main,maxWidth:"md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"_img",style:{background:"url("+profile+")",backgroundSize:"contain",backgroundPosition:"center",backgroundRepeat:"no-repeat"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"_content_wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"h2",variant:"h5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextDecrypt,{text:"".concat(greetings)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"aboutme",children:aboutme}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"#contact",className:"contact-btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-terminal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"span",children:" Send me a message."})]})]})]})})});};
